ValidationRule.description: Client processed can not have a date unless ready to process payroll-milestone has a date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Client_Processed__c)), ISBLANK(Ready_to_Process_Payroll2__c),
OR( RecordTypeId = '012700000001jeX', RecordTypeId = '012700000001kKx', RecordTypeId = "0120g000000grzo", RecordTypeId="0120g000000l3qD" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ready to process payroll-Milestone must have a date entered
